pages.text: A state-of-your-art Blast Furnace, which consumes $(c_orange)Orange Ink$() to smelt ores and the like.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Supplying a $(l:magical_items/knowledge_gem)Knowledge Gem$() allows you to automatically collect XP while smelting.

pages.name: Cinderhearth Structure
pages.text: The Cinderhearth's abilities can be enhanced via $(l:magical_blocks/upgrades)Upgrades$(). Place them on the two Chiseled Blocks.

pages.title: Block Checklist
pages.text: $(li)1 Cinderhearth$(li)23 Polished Blocks$(li)6 Crest Blocks$(li)5 Glass-like Blocks$(li)2 Chiseled Blocks$(li)6 Buckets of Lava$(br2)$(italic)Did it really need that Lava underneath since you already have $(c_orange)Ink$()$(italic)? No, not really. But it looks so much better.

pages.title: Upgrades
pages.text: Upgrades placed on the $(thing)Chiseled Blocks$() do not work automatically, but requires you to supply an additional type of Ink to the Cinderhearth. The higher the upgrades, the higher the consumption.

$(li)Speed ($(c_magenta)Magenta Ink$()):$(br)Faster smelt times$(br)$(li)Yield ($(c_light_blue)Light Blue Ink$()):$(br)Chance to multiply the output for most blocks$(br)$(li)Experience ($(c_purple)Purple Ink$()):$(br)Vastly increases experience gain$(br)$(li)Efficiency ($(c_black)Black Ink$()):$(br)Greatly decreases Ink Consumption of the other types, including $(c_orange)Orange$()
